articles.description: While the SEC ponders its decision on Ethereum options, the ETH ETF market on Monday saw its largest net outflows since July.

articles.description: Researchers from ETH Zurich used advanced machine learning to solve 100% of Google's reCAPTCHAv2, designed to distinguish humans from bots.
articles.title: AI Can Best Google’s Bot Detection System, Swiss Researchers Find

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: The six-month study involved 59 patients who suffered from moderate to severe depression. Thirty were given a single dose of psilocybin.
articles.title: Magic Mushrooms Are a Promising Treatment For Depression, New Study Finds

articles.description: Brain-computer interface tech startup Neurable has unveiled a set of headphones to optimize focus and help users manage distractions.
articles.title: Neurable's New $700 Headphones Track Brain Activity to Improve Focus and Fight Burnout

articles.description: OpenAI’s new voice feature brings faster, more natural conversations to ChatGPT Plus and Teams, but the controversial “Sky” voice remains on hold.

articles.description: Diamonds will provide some kind of advantage in the next full season of Hamster Kombat. Here’s how to stack ‘em tall on Telegram.

articles.description: Even after capitulating in his fight with Brazil, Elon Musk's X is still banned as users face stiff fines for "extreme" cases of posting content.

articles.description: Former Alameda Research CEO Caroline Ellison received a relatively light sentence in exchange for her testimony against Sam Bankman-Fried.

articles.description: A viral dark web post claiming to have leaked data from nearly 13 million Binance customers is fake, the prominent crypto exchange says.

articles.description: The internet's favorite baby pygmy hippo has gone viral and inspired meme coin that's already soared past a $70 million market cap.
articles.title: Moo Deng Solana Meme Coin Blasts Past $70M Market Cap in Two Weeks

articles.description: BTC needs to top $65.2k to put in a higher high. ETH ETFs see biggest outflow since July. ETH outperformance could be start of ‘alt season’. BlackRock gets 12hr BTC withdrawal from Coinbase. cbBTC only wrapped BTC to not show reserves. Telegram to share user data upon legal requests. EIGEN non-transferability to be removed Sep 30th. TIA announces $100m funding round. TIA deal was OTC token sale ‘done months ago’. Polymarket considers token, trying $50m raise. Maybe we will pay off debt with crypto: Trump. Harris unlikely to give full crypto policy pre-election. 13m Binance users’ data may have been leaked. Caroline Ellison likely won’t serve time in jail.
articles.title: FOMO HOUR 204 - MOODENG MOO-NING!

articles.author: Andrew Throuvalas
articles.description: Just like last week, another miner from Bitcoin’s earliest days has come back to life—and this one might be selling off their coins.
articles.title: Another Satoshi-Era Bitcoin Whale Is Moving Coins After 15 Years

articles.description: Looking for the X Empire daily combo and riddle solution for Tuesday, September 24? Here are the latest boosts for the Telegram game.
articles.title: Here Are Today’s ‘X Empire’ Elon Musk Game Daily Combo and Riddle

articles.description: Cloudflare’s tool enables websites to gate AI bot access and charge for content usage in the hopes of combating unauthorized scraping.

articles.description: In the latest update in the monthslong attempt by Riot to forcibly acquire Bitfarms, the two mining firms have come to a settlement.
articles.title: Bitcoin Miner Takeover Battle Cools as Riot and Bitfarms Reach Settlement

articles.author: Jose Antonio Lanz
articles.description: While users await Sora, Chinese company Kuaishou is rolling out new features and upgrades to its powerful Kling AI video generator.
articles.title: Kling 1.5 AI Video Generator Arrives to Challenge OpenAI's Sora

articles.description: Crypto funds saw $321m inflows last week. Kamala commits to crypto & AI expansion. TAO leads gains in AI hype, does 2x in 2 weeks. SUI TVL breaks $900m. Average Q4 returns for BTC is 88%. BTC Google searches down 75% since 2021. BTC 161 days from halving, when it rallied in 2020. Crypto VCs raised $2.2bn this year, well below 2021.
articles.title: FOMO HOUR 203 - KAMALA GOES PRO-CRYPTO

articles.description: SOL leads majors as Breakpoint begins. SOL launches Frankendancer on mainnet. Helio Pay allows Shopify items to sell on X. Franklin Templeton to launch fund on SOL. BTC short term holders fall at fastest rate in 12 years. MicroStrategy upsizes convertible note raise to $1bn. BingX loses $52m in hack. $243m crypto heist exposed by ZachXBT. Supreme Court of India hacked on X, shills scam. SocGen launches Euro stablecoin on SOL. Sky agrees to stop using WBTC. Germany shuts down 47 crypto exchanges. Stablecoin’s now 18th biggest holder of treasuries. Consensys lawsuit against SEC dismissed. Partisanship will stop Trump crypto plans: Hoskinson. Scaramucci working with Kamala on crypto.
articles.title: FOMO HOUR 202 - SOL STARTS TO SEND IT

articles.description: Crypto rips higher after Fed cuts 50bps. $22bn shorts would be liquidated by $70.5k. SUI continues to lead L1s, does 2.5x in a month. Trump buys burgers with Bitcoin. Bitcoin is hedge against US debt: BlackRock. Commerzbank to offer BTC & ETH trading. Solana unveils Seeker phone, $70m pre-orders Helius Labs raise $21.75m. WazirX hacker moves $32m ETH to Tornado cash. SEC made up crypto regulation ‘out of thin air’. BitGo to launch stablecoin. Revolut considers creating stablecoin. Ethena front-end gets hacked, funds safe.
articles.title: FOMO HOUR 201 - CRYPTO FLYS AFTER FED

articles.description: Bitcoin dominance rises ahead of Fed. May see short-term crash after Fed: Hayes. ETH underperformance may reverse soon: BitWise. Vitalik sings during Token 2049 appearance. SUI & FTM continue to outperform in L1s. BNB to introduce gasless stablecoin transfers. Tether market share hits 75%. Australia launches 3-year CBDC program. Russia to pay China in crypto for war supplies. USDC available for Brazil & Mexico bank transfers. We are one of the biggest users of blockchain: Dimon. Kamala may push crypto firms abroad: Nansen CEO. Dragonfly looking to raise $500m fund. Bitget users hit 45m, most growth from TON. Gensler pushed to clarify his stance on airdrops. Binance denies involvement in WazirX hack. Janus Henderson to tokenise fund. TON partners with Curve for stablecoin swaps. LINK & Fireblocks partner for stablecoin issuance. WalletConnect seat to airdrop 185m WCT tokens.
articles.title: FOMO HOUR 200 - DONALD TRUMP RECAP

articles.description: Dustin Stockton is known as the “Godfather of Political Finance” but he wasn’t always known this way. He was originally heavily involved in campaigning for Donald Trump and was the lead organizer of January 6. As the protest came closer, he realized things would go south and backed out. From home, he watched Trump supporters raid the capitol building. He knew his life was never going to be the same.
articles.title: How Jan 6. Organizer Became Meme Coin Kingpin

articles.description: Crypto majors bounce with stocks & gold after CPI. Kamala odds flip Trump after Presidential debate. SUI, FTM, ICP, TON lead gains in Alt L1s. Grayscale launches XRP trust, SUI to follow. FTX unstakes part of SOL position, large unlocks in Q1. 5 major announcements coming for SOL this month. SOL active addresses hits ATH for any blockchain. ETH dominance falls to 14%, lowest level in 3 years. AI coins strong as Nvidia & chip optimism returns. SWIFT set to build infrastructure for RWA trading. Coinbase launches wrapped Bitcoin product. ENS integrated with Venmo & PayPal. Pendle introduces Bitcoin yield pools at 45%. POPCAT gets Kraken listing, leads top SOL memes. SUNDOG breaks $300m after ByBit spot listing. Casino tokens rise, RLB up 100% in 2 weeks. Ape Punk sells in ‘heist’ for 10ETH. XCOPY editions & 1/1s see high sales. Fantasy Top trading volume continues to grow. Trump family set to launch crypto project Monday.
articles.title: FOMO HOUR 199 - SO ABOUT YESTERDAY

articles.description: Magic Eden's grip on the NFT market has been cemented by a multi-chain approach under co-founder and CEO Jack Lu. Now the marketplace is pushing forward with a digital wallet that bridges Bitcoin, Ethereum, and Solana as it eyes other future expansions. Lu discusses Magic Eden's evolution since its early days, along with valuable lessons learned in the turbulent crypto industry.
articles.title: Why CEO Jack Lu Is Pushing Magic Eden Beyond NFTs

articles.description: Crypto rises with stocks after CPI falls again. Bitfinex BTC longs continue to grow. SUI again leads L1s, up 18%. FTX estate unstakes $24m SOL, still has $943m. Binance introduces SOL liquid staking. SWIFT introduces infrastructure for RWA transfers. Pendle launches Bitcoin yield pools. UK makes crypto legal property. India leads crypto adoption for second year. Vitalik won’t advertise L2s with multi-sig security. Based rollups seen as alternative future for ETH. Blockchain music start up raises $50m. Ford & Toyota file blockchain patents.
articles.title: FOMO HOUR 198 - THE GREAT APE HEIST!

articles.description: Crypto falls slightly after Presidential debate. Exchanges see highest BTC outflow since May. Be wary of Yen move for BTC: Hayes. SOL active addresses hit ATH. At least 5 massive SOL announcements coming: Mert. Binomial to introduce restaking on BNB. Indonesian exchange hacked for $22m. Atomic Wallet wins lawsuit over $100m hack. Lawyers argue Ellison shouldn’t go to jail. ENS integrated with Venmo & PayPal. Galaxy & State Street launch 3 crypto ETFs. Standard Chartered begins UAE crypto custody. AAVE leads resurgence in DeFi coins.
articles.title: Fomo Hour 197 - Debate Disaster

articles.description: BTC ETFs: +$29m, ETH ETFs: -$5m. BTC rallies, ETF has first inflow in 9 trading days. BTC may have put in first higher low in 6 months. Saylor predicts $13m price for BTC. Wealth advisors quickly adopting BTC: BitWise CEO. Binance among few firms to get Indonesia license. Spot trading on CEXs up 30% in August. SEC made $4.68bn from crypto firms in 2023. $5.6bn lost to scams in 2023. XRP security status may be unchallenged in appeal. EtherFi announces credit card on Scroll. Base has more DEX users than other L2s combined. Tether & Tron create taskforce against crime. TIA still only making $585 in daily fees. WLD investigated by Singapore police.
articles.title: FOMO HOUR 196 - THE INFLOWS RETURN!

articles.description: BTC: 55.3k (+2%), ETH: 2320 (+1%), SOL: 130 (0%). Top Gainers: FTM, TAO, BTT, AAVE, TON, ATOM. Crypto mini-bounce continues, BTC reclaims $55k. BTC RSI hits lowest level since July 2021. Bitfinex longs continue to grow aggressively. BTC hashrate hits another ATH. BTC could hit $90k on Trump election: Bernstein. BlackRock settles intraday BTC trades off-chain. Spot BTC ETFs have been a failure: Bianco. Power giant Tepco explores Bitcoin mining. ETH Foundation & Vitalik continue to sell ETH. Farcaster DAU’s down 95%.
articles.title: FOMO HOUR 195 - CAN WE GET A BOUNCE?

articles.description: Media company DASTAN, the parent company of Decrypt and Rug Radio, is embarking on the next stage of its evolution with the launch of MYRIAD, a prediction market and engagement ecosystem that aims to “transform the digital media landscape.”
articles.title: Presenting MYRIAD, a prediction market and digital media engagement ecosystem

articles.description: Crypto weak after continued ETF outflows. Durov breaks silence, TON bounces 3%. Telegram will start moderating private chats. Hayes & Brandt flip bearish on BTC. Coinbase shares hit 7 month lows. 90% of crypto firm applications rejected in UK. Japan’s 3 largest banks to trial stablecoins. Trump promises again to embrace crypto. INJ launches BlackRock BUIDL index. DWF to launch synthetic stablecoin. Vitalik to donate all L2 tokens to charity. Most VCs in crypto ‘will disappear’.
articles.title: FOMO HOUR 194 - ARE NFTS BACK?

articles.description: Head of Research at CoinMarketCap, Alice Liu, breaks down the highs and lows of meme coin mania in 2024. We’ve seen meme coins like Dogwifhat (WIF) soar to huge market caps and we’ve seen political meme coins crash as the candidate drops out (BODEN). Liu explains the data behind all of this.
articles.title: Crypto Researcher Explains Meme Coin Mania

articles.description: Crypto falls on macro wobble, Yen fears. OI wiped in BTC drop to $56k, funding negative. Altcoins down 13% YTD, stablecoin supply up 30%. BTC mining profitability at record low: JP Morgan. FBI says North Korea targeting BTC ETF issuers. Trump family to launch DeFi project on ETH. Trump project linked to AVAX’s Dough Finance. Trump family members hacked during launch. AI coins underperform after Nvidia investigation. MATIC upgrade to POL begins. TON falls as Telegram faces issues in many countries. VC funding & BTC correlation breaks down. We have entered crypto’s ‘corporate phase’. Gensler will leave regardless of election: Ripple CEO. Harris campaign has asked Coinbase for advice. Penpie DeFi project hacked for $27m. Galois Capital settles with SEC over FTX custody.
articles.title: FOMO HOUR 193 - NVIDIA DROPS-OFF

articles.description: OI continues to rise as BTC stabilises. BTC still best performing assets class this year. FTX to distribute $16bn to creditors starting in Q4. Qatar introduces regulatory framework for crypto. ETH L1s fees down 90%, L2 activity ATH. Base hits 14m monthly users, many may be Sybil. ETH is in death spiral: Krueger. SOL to see significant unlocks in Q1. Japan considers dropping crypto tax to 20%. Rate cuts won’t help BTC: Hayes. BTC should double after rate cuts: Tapiero. Mr 100 linked back to Upbit wallet. WazirX hacker moves funds to Tornado. SUI to launch handheld gaming device. Sony & PYTH announce collaboration.
articles.title: FOMO HOUR 192 - WTF IS ETHERVISTA

articles.description: Kabosu, the dog many know as Doge and the mascot of Dogecoin, sadly passed away earlier this year. Its owner later adopted another Shiba Inu called Neiro which caused a long blockchain civil war with multiple tokens battling it out for liquidity. Now a month later SlumDOGE, the man who became a millionaire off Dogecoin (but never sold), explains why Neiro is a moment for the dog coin community to unite.
articles.title: Dogecoin Millionaire Explains How Neiro United Meme Coins

articles.description: BTC ETFs: -$72m, ETH ETFs: -$2m. BTC weekly volatility returns to multi-year lows. BlackRock BTC ETF sees first outflow in months. ETH dominance hits 4-year low. Vitalik linked wallet sells $2m ETH. Bukele talks up BTC impact in Time interview. CBoE files for ETH & BTC ETF options. Elon & Tesla win DOGE manipulation lawsuit. Macron denies inviting Durov to France. Trump promises to make US the ‘crypto capital’. Trump advertises Liberty Financial DeFi project. DeFi mindshare continues to grow.
articles.title: FOMO HOUR 191 - CRYPTO STABLE

articles.description: BTC: 59.7k (0%), ETH: 2545 (0%), SOL: 146 (-1%). Top Gainers: HNT, IMX, ICP, ADA, KCS. BTC ETFs: -$105m, ETH ETFs: +$6m. Bitcoin in tight liquidation range, ETH outperforms. ETH ETF sees first in flow in 10 days. Funding rates all turn negative. Mr 100 buys 500 BTC in dip. France formally charges Durov, can’t leave country. TON jumps 6% after Durov release. TON faces another outage related to DOGS. AI coins fall after Nvidia earnings. Crypto payments about to soar: Armstrong. Binance denies freezing Palestinian accounts. CryptoCom & Standard Chartered partner.
articles.title: FOMO HOUR 190 - OPENSEA VS SEC
